forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Friday the 5th: Update Camp Crystal Lake

comments.text: Hi! Here's more of what's new today in latest version 160.17 (you're on [version])! Enjoy!
The number of your Created Areas showing in the areas dialog is now upped from 40 to 250, in case you ever missed some!
Created Areas are now also sorted alphabetically in the expanded pageable view (the first two shown by default remain to be the most visited ones + most recently edited)!
The friendship strength signal (which helps sort the friends dialog) is now also increased when you add someone as editor, and as editor-list editor!
When clicking from Friends list to Profile and Back, it now sends back to the specific page you were on!
And update 160.18: We fixed the ability to include Thing attachments into the thread-starting comment, too (by dragging them from the inventory while writing, as usual)!
Also, we fixed an issue where if you dragged an attachment into a comment but then cancel it, it would still be posted into your next comment that session!

thread.latestCommentText: Also, we fixed an issue where if you dragged an attachment into a comment but then cancel it, it would still be posted into your next comment that session!
